Summary: Causes dihydrolipoyl dehydrogenase deficiency in a recessive manner, a severe condition affecting several body systems. Recorded in ClinVar by OMIM (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/clinvar/RCV000012744) this was is original reported by Shaag et al 1999 (PMID: 9934985) who found this variant causal in 12 of 14 mutant alleles in 7 Ashkenazi families.
